item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ North Bay Python 2023
item.description: Angela’s Organic Ice Cream Petaluma After giving my talk (PEP Talk) at North Bay Python in July 2023, I went to Angela’s Organic Ice Cream in Downtown Petaluma for a Lavender Ice cream. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Mariatta Wijaya (@mariatta81) Here’s where you can find Angela’s Organic Ice Cream:

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2023
item.description: PyCon US 2023 was really special ðŸ˜Š I get to do Ice cream selfies with various people! Rockwell Ice Cream With Ned Batchelder (photo taken by Ned Batchelder, from his blog post here. We went to Rockwell Ice Cream. We ran into Drazen Lucic while at Rockwell Ice Cream. Capo Gelateria Italiana With Georgi Ker, Cheuk-Ting Ho, and Zac Hatfield-Dodds at Capo Gelateria Italiana. Never too late to post our #icecreamselfie with @mariatta @cheukting_ho and Zac to get 1 point @pycon US.
